name: Unown Q
author: Kent Kanetsuna
flavor_text: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.

poke_power.name: QUICK
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown Q is on your Bench, you may discard all cards attached to Unown Q and attach Unown Q to 1 of your Pokémon as a Pokémon Tool card. As long as Unown Q is attached to a Pokémon, you pay {C} less to retreat that Pokémon.
